field.name: jQuery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: Enable or Disable the latest jQuery version. Make sure that jQuery is loaded only once on your website.

field.name: AnimationSpeed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Sets the amount of time in milliseconds the transition between slides will last

field.name: Repeat
field.label: Repeat Animation
field.description: Start the slideshow again after last slide.

field.name: TimerSpeed
field.label: Timer Speed
field.description: Sets the amount of time in milliseconds before transitioning a slide

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: Pause on Hover
field.description: Pauses on the current slide while hovering.

field.name: resumeNotHover
field.label: Resume Animation
field.description: Resumes playback after mousing out of slide.
